info.title: API Banking - Accounts
info.description:
**API Banking - Accounts**
Provides account information, balances and information about transactions. It allows to retrieve all available data for customer's authorised account services, such as basic account details, account balances for single or multiple accounts and transaction summary.

tags.name: Account Services
tags.description: Account Services APIs enable you to fetch the account details, balances and transaction details.

get.summary: Single Account Balances by Account ID
get.description: The Single Account Balances by Account ID API enables you to retrieve various balance information such as opening available balance, opening actual balance, opening booked balance, closing available balance, closing actual balance, and closing booked balance for the specified account number and/or currency, BIC, and date.

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: The client account number for which the account balance is requested.

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: The ISO currency code of the account.

parameters.name: swiftBic
parameters.description: Standard Chartered Bank's BIC, where the account is opened.

parameters.name: businessDate
parameters.description:
The date of the account balance to be retrieved. Balances can be queried up to 90 days in the past. If not provided, the current date will be used. If not provided or there is no balance information for the provided date, the balance of the latest date that has data will be fetched.
For instance, the provided date is 2024-05-30 but the latest available data is on 2024-05-18. Therefore, the balance information fetched will be for 2024-05-18.

400.description: Invalid request. Missing or invalid data.

403.description: Data access profile (DAP) check failure. Please use the valid accountId tagged to the respective groupId.

500.description: Internal server error. This indicates error on the webserver hosting the API.

503.description: Microservice dependency is down or undergoing maintenance. Try again later.

get.summary: Bulk Account Balances by Group ID
get.description: The Bulk Account Balances by Group ID API enables you to retrieve various balance information such as opening available balance, opening actual balance, opening booked balance, closing available balance, closing actual balance, and closing booked balance for multiple account numbers under the specified group ID and/or date with pagination.

parameters.name: businessDate
parameters.description:
The date of the account balance to be retrieved. Balances can be queried up to 90 days in the past. If not provided, the current date will be used. If not provided or there is no balance information for the provided date, the balance of the latest date that has data will be fetched.
For instance, the provided date is 2024-05-30 but the latest available data is on 2024-05-18. Therefore, the balance information fetched will be for 2024-05-18.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number to be returned. If this value is not provided, the default value used will be 1.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The number of records to return per page. If this value is not provided, the default value used will be 100.

400.description: Invalid request. Missing or invalid data.

403.description: Data access profile (DAP) check failure. Please use the valid accountId tagged to the respective groupId.

500.description: Internal server error. This indicates error on the webserver hosting the API.

503.description: Microservice dependency is down or undergoing maintenance. Try again later.

get.summary: Single Account Transactions by Account ID
get.description: The Single Account Transactions by Account ID API enables you to retrieve the account transaction details for the specified account number and/or currency, BIC, and start and end date with pagination.

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: The client account number for which the account transactions is requested.

parameters.name: swiftBic
parameters.description: Standard Chartered Bank's BIC, where the account is opened.

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: The ISO currency code of the account.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number to be returned. If this value is not provided, the default value used will be 1.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The number of records to return per page. If this value is not provided, the default value used will be 100.

parameters.name: startDate
parameters.description: The start date of the transactions to be retrieved.

parameters.name: endDate
parameters.description: The end date until which the transactions is to be retrieved.

400.description: Invalid request. Missing or invalid data.

403.description: Data access profile (DAP) check failure. Please use the valid accountId tagged to the respective groupId.

500.description: Internal server error. This indicates error on the webserver hosting the API.

503.description: Microservice dependency is down or undergoing maintenance. Try again later.

get.summary: Single Account Details by Account ID
get.description: The Single Account Details by Account ID API enables you to retrieve the account details for the specified account number and/or account status, account type, currency, and BIC.

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: The client account number for which the account details is requested.

parameters.name: swiftBic
parameters.description: Standard Chartered Bank's BIC, where the account is opened.

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: The ISO currency code of the account.

parameters.name: accountType
parameters.description:
The specific account type to be retrieved.
CA – Current Account
CD – Cash Deposit
SA – Savings Account

parameters.name: accountStatus
parameters.description:
The specific status of the account to be retrieved.
O – Open
A – Active
U – Unclaimed
C – Closed
D – Dormant

400.description: Invalid request. Missing or invalid data.

403.description: Data access profile (DAP) check failure. Please use the valid accountId tagged to the respective groupId.

500.description: Internal server error. This indicates error on the webserver hosting the API.

503.description: Microservice dependency is down or undergoing maintenance. Try again later.

get.summary: Bulk Account Details By Group ID
get.description: The Bulk Account Details by Group ID API enables you to retrieve the account details for the specified account numbers under the specified Group ID with pagination.

parameters.name: accountType
parameters.description:
The specific account type to be retrieved.
CA – Current Account
CD – Cash Deposit
SA – Savings Account

parameters.name: accountStatus
parameters.description:
The specific status of the account to be retrieved.
O – Open
A – Active
U – Unclaimed
C – Closed
D – Dormant

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The page number to be returned. If this value is not provided, the default value used will be 1.

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: The number of records to return per page. If this value is not provided, the default value used will be 100.

400.description: Invalid request. Missing or invalid data.

403.description: Data access profile (DAP) check failure. Please use the valid accountId tagged to the respective groupId.

500.description: Internal server error. This indicates an error in the API server.

503.description: Microservice dependency is down or undergoing maintenance. Please try again later.

accountBalances.description: The details of the account types balances in the account.

productCode.description: The product code of the account

productSubCode.description: The product subcode of the account

swiftCode.description: Standard Chartered Bank's BIC, where the account is opened

bank.description: The financial institution name of the account

branch.description: The financial institution branch code of the account

currency.description: The ISO currency code of the account

id.description: The unique ID of the account

amount.description: The balance amount. The whole amount has a maximum of 16 digits with up to two decimal points.

currency.description: The ISO currency code of the balance amount.

BalanceAmount.description: The details of the balance amount and currency.

page.description: The page number to be returned.If this value is not provided, the default value used will be 1.

size.description: The number of records to return per page. If this value is not provided, the default value used will be 100.

total.description: The total number of records available.

Metadata.description: The pagination details of the returned results.

CreditDebitIndicator.description: Indicates whether the specified balance is positive (credit) or negative (debit). Zero balance is considered as positive.

swiftBic.description: Standard Chartered Bank's BIC, where the account is opened.Standard Chartered Bank's BIC, where the account is opened.

ccyCode.description: The ISO currency code of the account.

transactionReference.description: The customer reference provided by the client during the transaction.

valueDateTime.description: The date when the transaction happened.

transactionInformation.description: The narrations (line 1 to 6) pertaining to the transaction.

payAmount.description: The payment amount. The whole amount has a maximum of 16 digits with up to two decimal points.

payCcy.description: The ISO currency code of the payment.

contractIdentification.description: The unique identification to identify the foreign exchange contract.

amount.description: The charge amount. The whole amount has a maximum of 16 digits with up to two decimal points.

currency.description: The ISO currency code of the charge amount.

ChargeAmount.description: The details of the charge amount and currency.

amount.description: The debit amount or credit amount based on transactions.creditDebitIndicator.

currency.description: The ISO currency code of the balance amount.

TransactionAmount.description: The details of the transaction amount and currency.

currency.description: The ISO currency code of the account

businessDate.description: The date of the balance to be retrieved.

accountBalances.description: The details of the account types and balances in the account.

self.description: The URL of the page returned.

next.description: The URL of the page after the returned page.

Links.description: The URLs of the pagination results.

BalanceType.description:
The balance type based on opening, current, and closing balance.
Value Description
OpeningAvailable Opening available balance including overdraft (OD) limit
OpeningActual Opening balance excluding OD limit
OpeningBooked Opening ledger balance
ClosingAvailable Closing available balance including OD limit
ClosingActual Closing balance excluding OD limit
ClosingBooked Closing ledger balance

Balance.description: The details of the account types and balances in the account.
